properties.description: Design and coordination of innovative educational programs, with a focus on interdisciplinary education, community science, and teacher training.
Development of educational resources, lesson plans, and interdisciplinary curricula for schools, universities, and non-formal education settings.
Application of systems thinking to sustainability science, education, and human behavior research.
Development and use of agent-based models (ABM) to simulate social-ecological systems and resource management scenarios.
Creation of interactive and static visualizations for educational and research purposes using tools such as D3.js and other platforms.
Leading interdisciplinary teams, partnership coordination, and project management in educational and scientific contexts.
Conceptualizing, writing, and managing grant proposals for educational and scientific projects.
Delivering professional talks and presentations at scientific conferences, public events, and educational settings.
